alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Ottawa; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 8:55PM CDT until April 14 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ottawa County in north central Kansas... Northwestern Clay County in north central Kansas... Southern Washington County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Cloud County in north central Kansas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 855 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Palmer to 7 miles north of Minneapolis, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clay Center, Clyde, Clifton, Miltonvale, Linn, Greenleaf, Morganville, Barnes, Palmer, Aurora, Vining, Oak Hill and Idana. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
